ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] numberOfDoses with data type Integer
Contains exactly one [1..1] seriesName with data type String
Contains zero or more [0..*] vaccineSeriesDose, where its type is Vaccine Series Dose
Contains zero or more [0..*] seriesRule, where its type is Rule
Contains exactly one [1..1] patientSeries, where its type is Patient Series
